document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Astronomer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">stops </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">seeking </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Pleiad's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">lone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">British </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Lady </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Forsakes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Arctic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Race </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Covenant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Needle </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Sailor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">doubting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">turns </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">amply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">early </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ask </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">treason </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">means </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: When the astronomer stops seeking
